title: How to Become an IRCTC Agent - Step-by-Step Guide
summary: Complete English guide on IRCTC agent registration process, eligibility, commission, and business opportunity.
content:
If you want to become an authorized IRCTC agent, follow these steps:

1. Choose a reliable IRCTC PSP (Principal Service Provider) such as Akbar Travels, PayPoint India, SIOnline, etc.
2. Complete KYC documents: Aadhar Card, PAN Card, Passport-size photo.
3. Pay registration fee (‚Çπ1,500 ‚Äì ‚Çπ5,000 approx).
4. Get Digital Certificate (DSC) via the PSP.
5. Training and login credentials provided after approval.

‚úÖ Benefits:
- Earn commission on ticket bookings (Rs. 20-40 per ticket).
- Additional income via travel insurance, hotels, tour packages.
- Build your identity as a government-authorized travel agent.

üí° For registration help, contact FTech Global ‚Äì we assist with IRCTC agent sign-up PAN India.
